title: Pilot
desc: Newly-deceased Eleanor Shellstrop is sent to the Good Place but only by mistake; Eleanor is determined to become a better person in her afterlife with help from friends Chidi and Janet.

title: Flying
desc: Eleanor tries to prove to Chidi that she's worthy of his help; Tahani and Jianyu try to help Michael cope with a mysterious flaw in his neighborhood.

title: Tahani Al-Jamil
desc: Chidi starts giving Eleanor formal lessons in ethics -- the first lesson is to be kind to your neighbor; Michael and Janet assist Chidi in finding a new hobby.

title: Jason Mendoza
desc: Eleanor has a hard time remaining hidden; Michael asks Tahani to assist a neighbor in finding her true purpose.

title: Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis
desc: Teaching Eleanor about ethics becomes a full-time job for Chidi; Michael and Janet must deal with an emergency.

title: What We Owe to Each Other
desc: Eleanor is enlisted to help Michael with an important task that could determine her fate in the Good Place. Meanwhile, Chidi agrees to be the third wheel in an effort to help out his friend.

title: The Eternal Shriek
desc: Eleanor and Chidi find that the only way to save Michael from going to "The Eternal Shriek" ( part of the Bad Place) is to deactivate Janet. Since she is programmed to answer any question, Janet tells them exactly how to do it.

title: Most Improved Player
desc: Michael has a private meeting with Eleanor. Meanwhile, Chidi, who has been harboring a secret, contemplates what to do.

title: ...Someone Like Me as a Member
desc: Michael's skills are put to the test when he attempts to sort out an unprecedented situation. Meanwhile, Chidi makes a connection elsewhere, much to the dismay of Eleanor, while Janet shows a different side of herself.

title: Chidi's Choice
desc: Michael tasks Chidi with making an important decision, while Eleanor makes a personal discovery and Jianyu makes a big announcement.

title: What's My Motivation
desc: Eleanor and Tahani hatch a plan as Michael makes a surprising discovery. Chidi confides in Eleanor when he learns some interesting news.

title: Mindy St. Claire
desc: Chidi and Tahani help Michael as he faces his first biggest challenge yet; Eleanor, Jianyu and Janet face a huge decision; Eleanor and her friends think about their fates.

title: Michael's Gambit
desc: Shawn has decided that Fake Eleanor, Chidi, Jason and Tahani must decide among themselves in thirty minutes which two of them should go to The Bad Place. Chaos and confusion ensues.

title: Everything Is Great!
desc: After Michael erases their memories, Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason find themselves in the Good Place again, but Eleanor finds a clue she left for herself and tries to put everything together.

title: Dance Dance Resolution
desc: Michael continues working out the kinks in his plan and Eleanor discovers a secret.

title: Team Cockroach
desc: Michael looks at things from a different angle as Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason try to make a collective decision.

title: Existential Crisis
desc: Michael experiences an existential crisis; Tahani throws a dinner party; Eleanor reflects on her childhood.

title: The Trolley Problem
desc: Chidi and Eleanor tackle a famous ethical dilemma, leading to a conflict with Michael; Tahani confides in Janet.

title: Janet and Michael
desc: When the neighborhood experiences a small glitch, Michael has to resolve the issue with Janet before it gets out of control.

title: Derek
desc: Janet creates a problem for Michael; Tahani and Jason plan a wedding; Eleanor reveals a secret to Chidi.

title: Leap to Faith
desc: Michael gets a surprise visitor; Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason try to solve a riddle.

title: Best Self
desc: Michael gets into a bind; Eleanor has an idea that leads Chidi, Tahani, Jason and even Janet to put their feelings on the line.

title: Rhonda, Diana, Jake, and Trent
desc: Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani, Janet and Jason go to a place with potentially lasting implications.

title: The Burrito
desc: Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason consider how much they have (or haven't) improved; Michael must deal with the consequences of his recent actions.

title: Somewhere Else
desc: Michael makes a plea; Eleanor looks to take the high road; Michael tries to pull a rabbit out of a hat.

title: Everything Is Bonzer!
desc: Michael prevents the deaths of Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason, hoping a second chance at life will allow them to become better people.

title: The Brainy Bunch
desc: Michael is forced to take drastic measures when his grand scheme hits a snag.

title: The Snowplow
desc: An announcement from someone in the group threatens to tear them apart.

title: Jeremy Bearimy
desc: The group explores the three main branches of ethical thought.

title: The Ballad of Donkey Doug
desc: Jason visits with some people from his past while Chidi gets help in resolving a problem.

title: A Fractured Inheritance
desc: Eleanor makes a startling discovery that tests her resolve, Tahani looks to make amends and Janet does some bonding.

title: The Worst Possible Use of Free Will
desc: Eleanor recalls some forgotten events from her past.

title: Don't Let the Good Life Pass You By
desc: Michael and Janet take an important journey. Eleanor ponders whether she should share a secret.

title: Janet(s)
desc: With Janet's help, Michael hatches a plan.

title: The Book of Dougs
desc: Michael's resolve is put to the test. Meanwhile, Jason wrestles with his feelings and Chidi surprises Eleanor.

title: Chidi Sees the Time-Knife
desc: Eleanor and the gang meet the judge at the crossroads of all dimensions, time and space to plead their case and Janet makes a reconnection.

title: Pandemonium
desc: Michael's crisis forces Eleanor to assume the title of the neighborhood architect. Tahani makes a discovery about the new humans.

title: A Girl from Arizona
desc: With Eleanor assuming the role of the architect, the group adapts to the challenges facing them when four test subjects inhabit a new neighborhood under their supervision.

title: A Girl from Arizona Part 2
desc: Eleanor, Michael, Janet and Tahani have their hands full when the new residents begin to show their true colors. Jason receives some unsettling news.

title: Chillaxing
desc: Michael and Eleanor discover something troubling and turn to an unusual source for help; Tahani lends her expertise to assist with one of the new residents.

title: Tinker, Tailor, Demon, Spy
desc: Uncertainty abounds when an unexpected visitor arrives.

title: Employee of the Bearimy
desc: Michael and Jason hatch a plan. Eleanor learns firsthand the difficulties of running the neighborhood.

title: A Chip Driver Mystery
desc: One of the new residents creates a division in the ranks.

title: Help Is Other People
desc: On the last day of the experiment, Chidi is faced with one final ethical dilemma.

title: The Funeral to End All Funerals
desc: The group awaits the judge's final decision on the fate of human existence.

title: The Answer
desc: In an attempt to plan a better future, Chidi considers his past.

title: You've Changed, Man
desc: As the Judge keeps searching for the device to reboot the Earth in Janets' voids, the 'soul squad' tries to come up with a new afterlife system.

title: Mondays, Am I Right?
desc: Michael runs some tests and Chidi gets some good advice from Jason.

title: Patty
desc: The group makes some new friends.

title: Whenever You're Ready
desc: Michael works with the Joint Council of Afterlife Affairs to smooth out kinks in the system. Jason and Tahani move on. Eleanor tries to influence Chidi.
